definition: to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)

sentences.english: Steel with low carbon content will not respond appreciably to hardening treatment.
sentences.chinese: 含碳量低的鋼對淬火處理沒有明顯的反應。

sentences.english: The carbon in forests exceeds the amount of carbon currently in the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 森林中的碳儲量超過目前大氣的含碳量。

sentences.english: It is suitable to make refractory containing carbon.
sentences.chinese: 由此合成的結合劑適用於含碳耐火材料的製造。

sentences.english: They found the carbon contained within was a heavier breed that what forms naturally on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現，這些分子的含碳量高於地球原生品種。

sentences.english: The oxidation atmosphere can promote the volatilisation of sulfur in pellets.
sentences.chinese: 氧化性氣氛可促進含碳球團中硫的揮發。

sentences.english: A carbon-containing composite was synthesized by heating element sulfur and carbon nanotubes.
sentences.chinese: 由單質硫與碳納米管合成一種新型含碳複合材料。

sentences.english: Carburizing of steel products used to carry out the role of carbon compounds known as carburizing agent.
sentences.chinese: 用來對鋼製品進行滲碳作用的含碳混合物稱爲滲碳劑。

sentences.english: The higher the carbon content, the slower this rate must be.
sentences.chinese: 含碳量越高，冷卻的速率必須越慢。

sentences.english: The influence of new brightener dosage on the carbon content of zinc deposit was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了新型鍍鋅光亮劑的用量對鋅鍍層含碳量的影響。

sentences.english: Cast steels behave differently from cast irons which contain a lot of carbon.
sentences.chinese: 鑄鋼的性能不同於含碳量高的鑄鐵。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)
